definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The real latent heat of Nylon 66 is measured by the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 运用这一方法测定了尼龙66的真实相变潜热。

sentences.english: The validity of simulation is directly determined by the model for latent heat treatment.
sentences.chinese: 潜热模型直接决定着模拟结果的准确性。

sentences.english: Sensible heat efficiency and latent heat efficiency are two critical evaluating indicators of total heat exchanger.
sentences.chinese: 全热交换器的重要评价指标是显热效率和潜热效率。

sentences.english: In this case latent heating and radiation cooling are comparable.
sentences.chinese: 在这种场合，潜热加热和辐射冷却数值相当。

sentences.english: Boiling point elevations are negligible as well as the variation of the heat capacities and latent heats with temperature.
sentences.chinese: 沸点升高以及热容和潜热随温度的变化忽略不计。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
(chemistry) mass transfer (as observed in processes like evaporation, distillation and membrane filtration)
